name: eqneltri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, c1))
-| wn(wcel(c2, c1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, c1))
-| wn(wcel(c2, c1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, c1))
-| wn(wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: If a class is not an element of another class, an equal class is also not an element. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
